name: ice-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user bites with
cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.
